The greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched firetrucks spray water on the smoldering NDP headquarters. The museum, home to the gold mask of King Tutankhamun that draws millions of tourists a year, also houses thousands of artifacts

Filling in for Rush on Monday, guest-host Mark Steyn took the news of Eminem's Detroit-is-back Super Bowl ad and Chrysler-Fiat CEO Sergio Marchionne 's`` shyster loan'' comment and went to town on Detroit. Unlike European cities, no bombs fell on this American city, this American city did it to themselves, he said, taking offense at the ad's protrayal of Detroit as a comeback city. He also zeroed in on Chrysler for taking corporate welfare then spending$ 9 million of it on a Super Bowl ad.

the company behind the Internet's dominant gateway. The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Mr. Eric Schmidt 's desire to tackle other challenges as much as Mr. Page's personal ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Mr. Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google Inc. dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings. Mr. Eric Schmidt , 55, will become executive chairman and remain available to advise Mr. Page, 37, and Google Inc.
